content.question: What are all values of p for which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>p</mi> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43B5@</annotation> </semantics> </math> converges?

choices.label: There are no values of <math> <semantics> <mi>p</mi> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGWbaaaa@39F0@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for which this integral converges.
